item.title: The Art And Craft of Problem Solving --Book Review
item.description: The art and craft of problem solving by Paul Zeitz is highly recommended for those who want to get started in competitive mathematical problems as well as who are looking for the opportunities to enhance problem-solving skills in general. This book begins with the mindset of a problem-solver followed by strategies, tactics, and topic-specific chapters. This book contains too many good points to tell you right now so I’m going to tell you how I changed before and after reading this book.
